Shock Hosting is focused on providing high quality hosting at an affordable price.

We go the extra mile to ensure that you are always satisfied and receive the best possible experience.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Current Promotion

Save 25% for life on all VPS Hosting plans! This is a recurring discount that applies to all billing cycles.

Use promotional code "25OFF" at checkout. We accept PayPal, all major credit/debit cards and Bitcoin.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Main Features
  • Technical Support Available 24/7/365
  • 7 Day Money Back Guarantee Policy
  • 99.9% Uptime Guarantee (SLA Policy)
  • Latest Server Hardware And Software
  • SolusVM VPS Control Panel (KVM)
  • 20 Gbps Network Level DDoS Protection
  • Additional IPv4 Address Just $1.99/Month
  • 1 Gbps Redundant Network Uplinks
  • Hardware RAID 10 Protected Pure SSD's
  • CacheVault Technology/Hardware
  • Linux and Windows Operating Systems
Datacenter Location: Piscataway, New Jersey or Los Angeles, California

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
